home.meta.title: Nomuman
home.heroLead: Product engineer in Japan. I build lightweight products and care about long-term craft.
home.about.title: About
home.about.body: I design and ship software with a focus on clarity, speed, and maintainability. My work spans mobile, web, and product design.
home.journey.title: Journey
home.journey.0.desc: Leading mobile and web initiatives with a small cross-functional team.
home.journey.1.desc: Built user-facing features and internal tools for a global SaaS platform.
home.journey.2.desc: Focused on performance and design systems for consumer web apps.
